text: Robert Saladrigas Riera (12 February 1940 â€“ 22 October 2018) was a Spanish political writer, journalist and literary critic. He was known for his articles on foreign literature published in CULTURA/S, the literary supplement of La Vanguardia newspaper. His literary work has been translated into Spanish, Portuguese and Romanian.
